page.title: DeFi for Aptos
page.description: Complete directory of DeFi protocols for di Aptos blockchain

Liquid Restaking.name: Liquid Restaking

Leveraged Farming.description: Borrow funds to increase liquidity provision and amplify farming rewards

Yield Aggregator.name: Yield Aggregator
Yield Aggregator.description: Automatically find and switch between di best yield opportunities

protocol_descriptions.Panora: "Meta-DEX" wey dey plug into on-chain order-book and 10+ AMMs, dey split orders across pools while e dey curate canonical token list wey dey auto-update for im UI.
protocol_descriptions.Tapp: Di first hook-enabled, Uniswap V4-style modular DEX for Aptos testnet; smart-contract hooks let builders compose custom pools while users get programmable swaps.
protocol_descriptions.Echelon: Lending hub wey support both E-Mode and isolated markets.
protocol_descriptions.Amnis: Dual-token system issue stAPT (yield-bearing) and amAPT (stable), letting users toggle between yield and stability while routing validator commission back to stakers.
protocol_descriptions.Kofi: MEV-boosted liquid staking with leveraged-LSD vaults.
protocol_descriptions.Moar: Building leveraged-farm layer with cross-protocol credit accounts enabling users to borrow for one place and deploy for another.
protocol_descriptions.Thala: Suite of DeFi apps featuring multi-pool AMM, di over-collateralized MOD stablecoin, and liquid-staking via sthAPT and thAPT.
